column.name: htmlheader
column.value:
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"
href="/webadmin/webeditor/webeditor.css" />
<script src="/webadmin/webeditor/webeditor.js"></script>
<style type="text/css">

form.directory{
	margin-bottom: 1em;
	}
	
fieldset.directory{
        margin: 10px 10px 0px 0px;
	padding: 10px 0px 10px 5px;
	border: 1px solid #666666;
	width: 480px;
	}
	
legend.directory{
	padding: 0 10px;
	text-transform: uppercase;
	font-size: 1.0em;
}

.directoryrow{
	clear: both;
	padding-top: 5px;
        margin: 0 10px;
	}

.directoryLabel{
	line-height: 1.6em;
	text-align: right;
	margin-right: 10px;
	width: 100px;
	float: left;
}
input.formField{
	float: left;
	width: 340px;
	}
	
textarea.directoryfield{
        float: left;
	font-size: 1em;
	width: 340px;
	}

input.formField,textarea.directoryfield{
	border: 1px solid #666666;
	padding: 2px;
	font-family: Arial,sans-serif;
        }

.directorysubmitButton{
	font-weight: bold;
	font-family: Arial,sans-serif;
	padding: 4px 6px;
	margin-right: 5px;
	width: auto;
	}	

.clearfix:after {
        content: ".";
        font-size: 0; 
        display: block; 
        height: 0; 
        clear: both; 
        visibility: hidden;
        }

.clearfix {
        display: inline-block;
        }

/* Hides from IE-mac \*/
        * html .clearfix {height: 1%;}
        .clearfix {display: block;}
/* End hide from IE-mac */

.fn {
	font-weight: bold;
        }

</style>

column.name: content
column.value:
Add category in @@@include:database=@@@import:directory@@@:id=###record###:Sub-Category@@@ under @@@include:database=@@@import:directory@@@:id=###record###:Name@@@

Fill in the form and press the Add button. Fields marked with an asterisk (*) are required.

Your New Category

Leave blank to enable job listing.
Otherwise fill in name of sub-category under this entry. (For example Countries or Specialist Areas. )

	border: 1px solid #666666;
	padding: 2px;
	font-family: Arial,sans-serif;
        }

.directorysubmitButton{
	font-weight: bold;
	font-family: Arial,sans-serif;
	padding: 4px 6px;
	margin-right: 5px;
	width: auto;
	}	

.clearfix:after {
        content: ".";
        font-size: 0; 
        display: block; 
        height: 0; 
        clear: both; 
        visibility: hidden;
        }

.clearfix {
        display: inline-block;
        }

/* Hides from IE-mac \*/
        * html .clearfix {height: 1%;}
        .clearfix {display: block;}
/* End hide from IE-mac */

.fn {
	font-weight: bold;
        }

</style>

column.name: htmlheader
column.value:
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" media="all" href="/webadmin/jscalendar/skins/aqua/theme.css" />
<script type="text/javascript" src="/webadmin/jscalendar/calendar.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="/webadmin/jscalendar/lang/calendar-en.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="/webadmin/jscalendar/calendar-setup.js"></script>
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"
href="/webadmin/webeditor/webeditor.css" />
<script src="/webadmin/webeditor/webeditor.js"></script>
<style type="text/css">

form.directory{
	margin-bottom: 1em;
	}
	
fieldset.directory{
        margin: 10px 10px 0px 0px;
	padding: 10px 0px 10px 5px;
	border: 1px solid #666666;
	width: 480px;
	}
	
legend.directory{
	padding: 0 10px;
	text-transform: uppercase;
	font-size: 1.0em;
}

.directoryrow{
	clear: both;
	padding-top: 5px;
        margin: 0 10px;
	}

.directoryLabel{
	line-height: 1.6em;
	text-align: right;
	margin-right: 10px;
	width: 100px;
	float: left;
}
input.formField{
	float: left;
	width: 340px;
	}
	
input.dateformField{
	float: left;
	width: 312px;
	}

textarea.directoryfield{
        float: left;
	font-size: 1em;
	width: 340px;
	}

input.formField,textarea.directoryfield{
	border: 1px solid #666666;
	padding: 2px;
	font-family: Arial,sans-serif;
        }

.directorysubmitButton{
	font-weight: bold;
	font-family: Arial,sans-serif;
	padding: 4px 6px;
	margin-right: 5px;
	width: auto;
	}	

.clearfix:after {
        content: ".";
        font-size: 0; 
        display: block; 
        height: 0; 
        clear: both; 
        visibility: hidden;
        }

.clearfix {
        display: inline-block;
        }

/* Hides from IE-mac \*/
        * html .clearfix {height: 1%;}
        .clearfix {display: block;}
/* End hide from IE-mac */

.fn {
	font-weight: bold;
        }

</style>
